name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-chartcard-filesbycontenttype
title: Chart Card Files By Content Type
shortDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension displays a pie chart showing documents of a selected document library by content type.
longDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension displays a pie chart showing documents of a selected document library by content type. The sample uses the Microsoft Graph API to get the document library items and their content types.
